name: Deus Devium (demo)
description:
An entry for the 2020 Global Game Jam, made in University of California, Santa Cruz. Link to Global Game Jam entry

You play as Squib, an eldritch being who has lost their powers after a statue of them was vandalized by an order of holy people. Squib must venture into the catacombs in order to recover artifacts to repair the statue and slowly gain your powers back.

Credits:

Tre Braswell - Programming

Ixel Camacho - Art

Jacob Compton - Programming

Jameson Danning - Design, Programming

Ryan Heath - Design, Sound Effects

Jess Wake - Art, Design

Colin Watterson - Programming

Enrico Widodo - Design, Music (SoundCloud link)
